title: True or False!
content: At this point, you have a pretty good understanding of Strings and Numbers in JavaScript. Let's move on to something much easier to understand: Booleans!

title: True or False!
content: In JavaScript, Strings can be anything within a single or double quote. A Number can be any number you wish. Booleans, on the other hand, can only have two values symbolizing a truthful or false value.
